name: Lint Report account-statement-client-api-v2.0.0.yaml-2.0.0
openApi:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Account Statement Client API
  version: 2.0.0
  description: |-
    ## Supported Operations

    Currently the Account Statement Client API contains the following operations:
    * Get account statements (GET and POST operations)
    * Get account statement categories
    * Download account statement

    ## Default Errors

    * HTTP 400:  Request for getting list of 'available' statements or downloading them could not be understood by the server.
    * HTTP 500: The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request.

    ## Authorization Errors

    * HTTP 403: Request for getting list of 'available' statements or downloading them was understood by the server but is refusing to fulfill it.
    * HTTP 404: The server has not found anything matching Request-URI.
    * HTTP 422: Request for getting list of 'available' statements or downloading them was understood by the server but was unable to process the contained instructions.

    Overall capability description can be found [here](https://community.backbase.com/documentation/DBS/latest/accountstatements_understand)
servers:
  - description: Prism mock server
    url: 'http://localhost:4010'
tags:
  - name: account-statement
paths:
  /client-api/v2/account/statements:
    get:
      description: Get the list of 'available' statements
      deprecated: true
      x-bb-api-deprecation-deprecated-from-version: DBS 2.20.0
      x-bb-api-deprecation-removed-from-version: DBS 2.21.0
      x-bb-api-deprecation-reason: '| The functionality covered by POST endpoint in client api.'
      x-bb-api-deprecation-description: '| From DBS 2.21.0 this endpoint will no longer be exposed. Please use POST /client-api/v2/account/statements endpoint instead.'
      operationId: getAccountStatements
      parameters:
        - name: accountId
          description: Id of an account
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            maxLength: 256
            type: string
        - name: dateFrom
          description: Date from which the statements should be retrieved
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 2017-02-03T00:00:00.000Z
        - name: dateTo
          description: Date to which the statements should be retrieved
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: 2017-02-03T00:00:00.000Z
        - name: category
          description: Categories to filter on
          example:
            - cat_1
            - cat_2
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        - name: from
          description: Skip over a page of elements by specifying a start value for the query
          example: 20
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 0
        - name: cursor
          description: |
            As an alternative for specifying 'from' this allows to point to the record to start the selection from.
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ''
          example: 76d5be8b-e80d-4842-8ce6-ea67519e8f74
        - name: size
          description: |
            Limit the number of elements on the response. When used in combination with cursor, the value
            is allowed to be a negative number to indicate requesting records upwards from the starting point indicated
            by the cursor.
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: 10
            format: int32
          example: 80
        - name: orderBy
          description: Order by field
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: accountName
        - name: direction
          description: Direction
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            default: DESC
            enum:
              - ASC
              - DESC
            type: string
          example: DESC
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Total-Count:
              $ref: '#/components/headers/TotalCount'
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                $ref: '#/components/examples/AccountStatementsResponse'
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountStatementsResponse'
          description: |
            List of account-statement

            Provides list of account-statements for given accounts.
            The size of list and content can be controlled by paging parameters.

            Count of items is in **X-Total-Count** header.
        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                example:
                  $ref: '#/components/examples/BadRequestError'
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BadRequestError'
          description: |-
            Either:

            * Request does not honor the contract, check the example in the Request tab.
            * There was one of the following logic errors resulting from the spec generation:

            | Message | key | context |
            --- | --- | ---
            | Invalid date format!!! -> **dateFrom** expected: yyyy-MM-dd | none | dateFrom: < invalidDate > |
            | Invalid date format!!! -> **dateTo** expected: yyyy-MM-dd | none | dateTo: < invalidDate > |
            | size must be greater than or equal to 1 | none | size: < less then 1 > |
            | orderBy must match "date/category/description/accountNumber/accountName" | none | orderBy: < invalid value > |
            | direction must match "asc/desc" | none | direction: < invalid value > |
        '401':
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                $ref: '#/components/examples/UnauthorizedError'
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UnauthorizedError'
          description: Unauthorized
        '403':
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                $ref: '#/components/examples/ForbiddenError'
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ForbiddenError'
          description: Forbidden
        '500':
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                $ref: '#/components/examples/InternalServerError'
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InternalServerError'
          description: InternalServerError
      summary: Get the list of 'available' statements.
      tags:
        - account-statement
      x-BbAccessControl-resource: account-statement
      x-BbAccessControl-function: Manage Statements
      x-BbAccessControl-privilege: view
    post:
      description: Get the list of 'available' statements for multiple accounts
      operationId: postAccountStatements
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            example:
              $ref: '#/components/examples/AccountStatementPostRequest'
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountStatementsPostRequest'
        description: Request body that contains query parameters
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            X-Total-Count:
              $ref: '#/components/headers/TotalCount'
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                $ref: '#/components/examples/AccountStatementsResponse'
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountStatementsResponse'
          description: |-
            List of account-statement

            Provide list of account-statement for given accounts.
            List size and content can be controlled by paging parameters.

            Count of items is in **X-Total-Count** header.
        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                example:
                  $ref: '#/components/examples/BadRequestError'
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BadRequestError'
          description: |-
            BadRequestError
            Either:

            * Request does not honor the contract, check the example in the Request tab.
            * There was one of the following logic errors resulting from the spec generation:

            | Message | key | context |
            --- | --- | ---
            | Invalid date format!!! -> **dateFrom** expected: yyyy-MM-dd | none | dateFrom: < invalidDate > |
            | Invalid date format!!! -> **dateTo** expected: yyyy-MM-dd | none | dateTo: < invalidDate > |
            | size must be greater than or equal to 1 | none | size: < less then 1 > |
            | orderBy must match "date/category/description/accountNumber/accountName" | none | orderBy: < inappropriate value > |
            | direction must match "asc/desc" | none | direction: < inappropriate value > |
        '401':
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                $ref: '#/components/examples/UnauthorizedError'
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UnauthorizedError'
          description: Unauthorized
        '403':
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                $ref: '#/components/examples/ForbiddenError'
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ForbiddenError'
          description: Forbidden
        '500':
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                $ref: '#/components/examples/InternalServerError'
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InternalServerError'
          description: InternalServerError
      summary: Get the list of 'available' statements for multiple accounts.
      tags:
        - account-statement
      x-BbAccessControl-resource: account-statement
      x-BbAccessControl-function: Manage Statements
      x-BbAccessControl-privilege: view
    summary: AccountStatements
  /client-api/v2/account/statements/categories:
    description: Endpoint to access list of categories
    get:
      description: Get the list of 'available' categories
      operationId: getCategories
      responses:
        '200':
          description: |-
            List of account statements categories

            Provide list of account statements categories across all accounts.
            Does not support pagination or sorting.

            Count of items is in **X-Total-Count** header.
          headers:
            X-Total-Count:
              $ref: '#/components/headers/TotalCount'
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                example:
                  $ref: '#/components/examples/AccountStatementsCategoriesResponse'
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountStatementsCategoriesResponse'
      summary: Get the list of 'available' categories.
      tags:
        - account-statement
      x-BbAccessControl-resource: account-statement
      x-BbAccessControl-function: Manage Statements
      x-BbAccessControl-privilege: view
    summary: AccountStatementsCategories
  '/client-api/v2/account/statements/download/{uid}':
    parameters:
      - name: uid
        description: UID of account statement file to be downloaded
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
    get:
      description: |
        Downloads an account statement file for the given file UID.
        Supported statement types:
          * binary/octet-stream
          * application/pdf
          * text/plain
          * text/csv
          * application/rtf
          * application/msword
          * application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document
          * application/vnd.ms-excel
          * application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet
          * application/xml
          * image/png
          * image/jpeg
          * image/gif
          * image/tiff
      operationId: downloadAccountStatements
      parameters:
        - name: inline
          description: Content-Disposition header will include "attachment" when this parameter is false. Else "inline".
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: true
      responses:
        '200':
          headers:
            Content-Disposition:
              $ref: '#/components/headers/ContentDisposition'
            Content-Length:
              $ref: '#/components/headers/ContentLength'
          content:
            binary/octet-stream: {}
            application/pdf: {}
            text/plain: {}
            text/csv: {}
            application/rtf: {}
            application/msword: {}
            application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document: {}
            application/vnd.ms-excel: {}
            application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet: {}
            application/xml: {}
            image/png: {}
            image/jpeg: {}
            image/gif: {}
            image/tiff: {}
          description: Download account-statement
        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                example:
                  $ref: '#/components/examples/BadRequestError'
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BadRequestError'
          description: BadRequest
        '403':
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                $ref: '#/components/examples/ForbiddenError'
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ForbiddenError'
          description: Forbidden
        '404':
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                $ref: '#/components/examples/NotFoundError'
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/NotFoundError'
          description: |-
            Either:

            * Request does not honor the contract, check the example in the Request tab.
            * There was one of the following logic errors resulting from the spec generation:

            | Message | key | context |
            --- | --- | ---
            | File not found for requested file uri 123 | none | uid path variable: 123 |
        '500':
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                $ref: '#/components/examples/InternalServerError'
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InternalServerError'
          description: InternalServerError
      summary: Download account-statement.
      tags:
        - account-statement
      x-BbAccessControl-resource: account-statement
      x-BbAccessControl-function: Manage Statements
      x-BbAccessControl-privilege: view
    summary: AccountStatementsDownload
components:
  schemas:
    AccountStatement:
      type: object
      properties:
        accountId:
          description: Reference to the account to which the statement belongs
          type: string
        accountName:
          description: Name of account
          type: string
        accountNumber:
          description: Number of account
          type: string
        date:
          description: The context agnostic statement date
          format: date
          type: string
        description:
          description: The description of the statement
          type: string
        category:
          description: Category of the account statement
          type: string
        documents:
          description: List of documents provided by the bank
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountStatementDocument'
          type: array
        additions:
          description: Additional properties
          type: object
          additionalProperties:
            type: string
      required:
        - date
        - documents
    AccountStatementDocument:
      type: object
      properties:
        uid:
          description: Unique identification of the statement returned in the response of the first call 'account-statements-get'
          type: string
        url:
          description: The url to download the statement sent by the CBS in the response of the first call 'account-statements-get'
          type: string
        contentType:
          description: The MIME type of the document
          type: string
        additions:
          description: Additional properties
          type: object
          additionalProperties:
            type: string
    AccountStatementsCategoriesResponse:
      type: object
      description: List of account statements categories
      properties:
        categories:
          description: Account statements category list
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        additions:
          description: Additional properties
          type: object
          additionalProperties:
            type: string
      required:
        - categories
      example:
        categories:
          - Account
          - Credit Card
          - Mortgage
          - Tax Form
          - LOC
          - EELOC
        additions:
          categoryId: '1'
    AccountStatementsPostRequest:
      type: object
      description: Expected body of POST account statement request
      properties:
        accountIds:
          description: Array of account identifiers.
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        dateFrom:
          description: Date from which the statements should be retrieved.
          type: string
        dateTo:
          description: Date to which the statements should be retrieved.
          type: string
        category:
          description: Categories to filter on.
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        from:
          description: Skip over a page of elements by specifying a start value for the query.
          format: int32
          type: integer
          default: 0
        cursor:
          description: As an alternative for specifying 'from' this allows to point to the record to start the selection from.
          type: string
        size:
          description: |-
            Limit the number of elements on the response. When used in combination with cursor, the value
            is allowed to be a negative number to indicate requesting records upwards from the starting point indicated by the cursor.
          format: int32
          type: integer
          default: 10
        orderBy:
          description: Order by field
          type: string
        direction:
          description: Direction
          enum:
            - ASC
            - DESC
          type: string
          default: DESC
        additions:
          description: Additional properties
          type: object
          additionalProperties:
            type: string
    AccountStatementsResponse:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountStatement'
      description: List of account statements
      example:
        - accountId: 1cdb2224-8926-4b4d-a99f-1c9dfbbb4699
          accountName: The Walt Disney Company
          accountNumber: UA85 3996 2200 0000 0260 0123 3566 1
          date: '2016-02-15'
          category: Credit Card

    ErrorItem:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          description: Any further information.
          type: string
        key:
          description: '{capability-name}.api.{api-key-name}. For generated validation errors this is the path in the document the error resolves to. e.g. object name + ''.'' + field'
          type: string
        context:
          description: Context can be anything used to construct localised messages.
          type: object
          additionalProperties:
            type: string
    UnauthorizedError:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
          description: Any further information
        errors:
          type: array
          description: Detailed error information
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorItem'
    BadRequestError:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          description: Any further information
          type: string
        errors:
          description: Detailed error information
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorItem'
      required:
        - message
    NotFoundError:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          description: Any further information
          type: string
        errors:
          description: Detailed error information
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorItem'
    ForbiddenError:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          description: Any further information
          type: string
        errors:
          description: Detailed error information
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorItem'
    InternalServerError:
      type: object
      description: Represents HTTP 500 Internal Server Error
      properties:
        message:
          description: Further Information
          type: string
